welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bergambacht, the charming city known for its picturesque canals and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and experience all that this beautiful destination has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles flights to and from European destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Handles flights to and from international destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Handles flights to and from intercontinental destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
